[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of Income Statement but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. CPIFI:IncomeTaxOnOtherComprehensiveIncomeItems, ifrs-full:Revenue, ifrs-full:OperatingExpense All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of 72,689,000 reported in the network role http://www.cpifimsa.com/role/BalanceSheet should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of 86,676,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.cpifimsa.com/role/ChangesinEquity, http://www.cpifimsa.com/role/Changesinequity2021. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of OtherReserves : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/222100KIDRQ6NNVYUH61/2021-12-31/ESEF/LU/0/CPI_FIM_S.A._20220331.zip/CPI_FIM_S.A._20220331/reports/CPI_FIM_FS_31_12_2021.xhtml 2113
